thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Kelun Pharmaceutical issues 2018 second tranche super short-term financing notes worth 700 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Kelun Pharmaceutical issues 2018 second tranche super short-term financing notes worth 700 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan kelun pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Sichuan Kelun Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it issued 2018 second tranche super short-term financing notes worth 700 million yuan with a term of 270 days and coupon rate of 5.65 percent
* Bank of Communications Co., Ltd and China Minsheng Banking Corp., Ltd served as the main underwriters
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/XDj7Rt
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
